transcript.text:
How are your friends today?
Me I'm great, I'm so great that today I want to tell you things

Last time I shared you anecdotes about the game of my childhood Dofus and it totally pleased you
Today I'm going to tell you
anecdotes about my teenagehood
First of all I'm going to speak about an incredible thing in teenagehood : The computer
In 2011 I was already doing videos on my youtube channel and so
I loved spending time in front of screens, I was always playing video games, I was always watching TV, well TV that's to say
Game one because this channel presented some anime, and I loved them, that's all.The problem is that my mom wasn't agree with this.
She didn't like seeing me watching TV
So she restrained me. She gave me hours when I could accessed the computer and when the hour was ended I just got out.
At this time I was living in a house where there were a basement and a second floor, and the computer was in the basement. So from 6pm to 7 am
I was playing the computer in the basement and then I wasn't allowed to play on it anymore. My mom didn't want to put a computer in my bedroom,
and it was justified because otherwise I would have made sleepless nights and I would have failed all my school years... But what she didn't know
when my mom was in a deep sleep at night
little Lucas went out in secret of his bedroom in pyjamas and what was he doing? He was going to the toilets
and when he was flushing, he took advantage from the noise of this one to down stairs with huge discretion
stairs in wood that make  in conclusion a maximum of noise...
So I was playing at Dofus like this for hours and hours and sometimes suspens
I heard somebody downing stairs...and here I told myself "Damn, option A it's my brother and I don't give a f*ck
option B it's my mother and I'm dead" In this room there was a sort of fitted cupboard
in which there was the boiler, and what I was doing is that I hided behind it when my mom was caming like a
good sh**
but I was really stupid because as I wasn't in my bedroom the only room where I could be was the basement.

"Lucas I know you're here
- No, nobody's here 
- You'll be without computer for 7 days
- Nooooooo!
It was THE mission every nights but what is cool is that I generally achieved to have more hours of computer every nights
so finally it was a real good time because you'll see that what is going to follow is much less fun.
a few years later my mom accepted to put a PC in my bedroom
the fact is that my mom had put a password too on the PC I didn't know
so when I wanted to go on the PC I had to ask her
and as mymom loved blackmail she told me "yes yes yes did you do your homeworks? Did you clean your room?
Did you wire 500 euros on my account?"
But mom I don't have money I'm only 15 ... SO LUCAS!
Once I had done all of this, I was allowed to go on the PC. My mom was caming, she was entering the password..but I found a technique because I was an exceptionnal hacker
I was gone to one of my friend and I've  burnt on a CD a thing that enabled to find the PC's password
one day i put it in my PC, I start the hacking software
and then I wait it to work to give me my PC's password
"guitare"
...wich isn't really a safe password. So for months I was on my PC whenever I wanted to ,
my mom not knowing and not doubting that I knew the password
I think for real she was doubting a little because I had multiplied the time spent in my bedroom by 600
and as I had no access to the PC she was asking herself "But what can he do in his bedroom ..."
But I was always playing without the sound to be aware, because if she would have open the door and she would have seen the PC, she would have understood
that I knew the password. I remember I was so an old man
I used to take the chair like this and i blocked the door like in movies. "Ok if my mom arrives, it's going to fall, it'll make noise
and so I will have time to turn off the screen and seeming to read a book"
Reassur you I have never needed to get to this point , I was, I was, I was malicious...But not as malicious as my mom!
A few years later, my mom
thinks about a new way to controll my time spent on screens, and here came her genious idea
Blaming her husband in order he finds the solution...
Thing that he did because my stepfather is informatician
and
damn he's been really clever. One day my mom comes on the PC and she told me "ok Lucas, now I'm going to take off the password, there is a parental control
it would be easier, because it turns on at this time, turns off at this time, I don't need to come and enter a password"
But it wasn't a parental control that she put, it was a homemade control-box
at 10pm the internet turns off so the first time I'm surprised... What?
Is is the internet that turns off? I down stairs where the box is and here man,
I discover the thing the most terrifying of my whole life. My dad had welded a timer in the power socket,
on which he had welded the freebox's power
I had told myself "But man fuck, I'll buy another freebox's power cable, I'll take off the first one and put the one I'll bought on the freebox
I'm a genius!" It was before discovering that the cable on the freebox
had been padlocked...That is to say that my stepfather had welded a little piece of iron, and so the padlock blocked the cable
and you couldn't take this one off the freebox
At this moment I was completely fucked...
Next I'm going to speak about food, and I think that it only aims my family because it's really strange
My mom had a problem with shopping, that is to say that when she did it, it was small ones for not being to expensive
and when we had all eaten she waited a little to shop again, so we were literaly starving
for many days, so my brother and me had in this house a treasure that we wanted to defend no matter what
Our alimentation was essentially composed (on mornings and teas) of brioche's slices with Nutella
Disruptive element... the level of nutella
fell every morning, but I want to say that every morning before the wake up and the breakfast, at night. With my brother we were becaming paranoid
I had even thought about putting a camera in the kitchen to see who was eating our nutella in our backs! And you remember when I spoke about the PC and the basement;
when someone downed the stairs I heard him/her at night. One day someone downs the stairs so I hide myself behind the boiler
as usual
waiting for this person to go back up stairs and go back to his bedroom, but after 10 minutes, still nothing, so I don't understand.  I decide
to go to the ground floor to see what's happening and as I'm opening the door of the kitchen I discover something that terrifies me
for life
My mother squatted in front of the cupboard where was the nutella, she turns around with a teaspoon in the hand and she gives at me a great strange look
In fact she was sleepwalking and she often went to the kitchen while sleeping and ate nutella
but she did not know on mornings when we ask she couldn't answer because she did not remember
we were allowed to one pot by week and she ate some of the nutella... you can laugh
but this body that I have today, it's because of this! We couldn't fee ourselves when we needed to!
ok?!
Third thing that I'm going to speak about in this video is all the goof up that I did as a teenager.
We all done little goof up we all know well.... WARNING Squeezie has one day finished in the police office
guess why, guess why, an amazing thing, a thug's thing, a thing that really makes policemen angry!

A thing where you can end in prison! 
I made firecrackers in a closed park...
Huge...I know!
I remember well, for the cops it's the whole operation of their career
They came at both sides of the park
They embark us on the police car but WHAT I was embarked on a police car once in my life
I'm a fucking thug!
I arrive at the commissionership they call all our parents, our parents,  pick us up, my mother arrives the cops made her a sick morality

"Madam he didn't do a good thing"
3yes I know 3 3but madam you realize?" " yes" " but"  "OK"
 my mother and I returned to home
and I've not been punished because she didn't really mind because I never did any goof up as I was always on  the PC
I couldn't do goof up outside
I was in ninth grade and I had math homeworks  to do at home, and once it was done we had to scan them and send them
through the messaging of the middle school
to your math teacher. So we had one account by student, your ID was your name (so me it was Hauchard)
and your password was your date of birth
(so me it was 27/01/1997) but when somebody had the same date of birth than you, you could know it for example with facebook,
and so you could connect yourself on his/her account of the messaging, and pretend to be this person.
So with all my friends we met to one of them named Quentin, we each connect ourselves on our messaging, we send our work,
and there I have a bulshit idea "hey men, Mathilde and I were born the same day, I mean, we can connect on her
account and pretend to be her! Moreover she is delegate so..." "Holly shit!"
We connect to her account and we decide to send a mail to the math teacher that has nothing to do with
a homemade work. So we wrote a mail that didn't insult the teacher at all. On the contrary it said "You're really
pretty madame, I saw you last time at the exit of the middle school and my heart ignited
I wish one day to meet you in a restaurant to have a drink together. We could know better each other,
or even more...
kiss on the pu***" This kiss, it's what will 4 days later cause us deep troubles.
4 days later we're in math and the SCE comes to ask for Quentin
SHIT! 10 minutes after the SCE comes
and he asks for me
"Lucas" . So I follow him (like this) and he brings me in the office of the director, and who's the one that I find here too?
My friend Quentin literally crying ("his big race" insult)
but really, he never cried like this in his whole life, it's certain! And he sold me : "But Lucas, we did it together"
This sentence like "I don't want to be the only one punished"
WHAT A BASTARD! He had completely
snitched on me because he had pooped on himself! For real I've had the idea so in a way I understand him but I mean
I had kind of an "honor code" in middle school you know : "You cannot snitched on your friends" you see... I don't know, it's funny.
Then the director told me "well, Lucas, you're the brain of the situation"
You see as if he was speaking of a bank robbery man, but we're speaking of an email, a prank! "Tell me who was with you on this day"
And I say nothing for 10 minutes. They try but I don't give up! And there was another math teacher who was there
and it's him who had invented this, he had coded the messaging of the middle school. And he begins to act like me
when I had the CD
which enables to find my PC's password : "Listen Lucas, it's quite easy, you and your 2 friends and Quentin
have sent your homeworks under the same IP adress, you know what's an IP adress héhéhé "
He was proud to know what's an IP adress this fool! "Well that's too bad Lucas because Mathilde's email has been sent
from the same IP adress" And here I'm on the floor, I'm not fine, in my head it's really... I tell myself "Damn no
I don't want my friends to fall because of me, we're going to go in prison (cries) "
and I have an idea and I say "Ah but it's normal in fact their PC had a problem and they asked us
to send their homeworks for them"
Don't hesitate to call me, I'm covering all kinds of infractions, don't hesitate!! So Quentin and I have been expelled for one week
it's huge, it's an amazing punishment in middle school. When you're expelled for one week it's really because you've done something as fuck!
and here...I've only sent an email but... nice!
(laugh) but I've ended with pu*** and it had really...my math teacher, I can assure you, was really shocked! I believe she even met
a therapist after this, but man the email had nothing of...
what!
It's...

Incredible!!!
Here we're are friends; it's already the end of the video, I wanted to share this with you because it's the memories that stay in me
About my teenagehood there are a lot of things that I've forgotten, most of my memorie I've totally forget, but I remember these ones because it completely
winded me up, and it winded me up for a good reason, it's because it's...it's kind of nonsens finally. So I hope you would have laughed,
Have a good time, see you soon in a next video, I'm extremely thirsty , I 've spoken all along this video
My mouth's full of cotton and my lips are dissolving! COME ON! See you in a new video, take care, and don't forget...
don't make firecrackers in a closed park
(laugh)
music
laziness to continue
